channel.title: Google translate country codes
channel.description: where can i get a list of the country codes for the google translate api? all i can find is a list of supported languages, but i have to specify a two char code. i can guess some like fr, it, en etc but i need all of them.

item.title: Google translate country codes
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

item.title: Google translate country codes
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

where can i get a list of the country codes for the google translate api? all i can find is a list of supported languages, but i have to specify a two char code. i can guess some like fr, it, en etc but i need all of them.
